titles.title: A resolution designating April 6, 2007, as "National Missing Persons Day".
A resolution designating April 6, 2007, as "National Missing Persons Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 115.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates April 6, 2007, as National Missing Persons Day.
